title: (x) The Waltons - Goudy Old Style {Yves}
content:
I need to ID the font on the cover of this DVD cover. "The Waltons"   
   
Hopefully it's not a proprietary font.   
   
 [http://www.tinoanh.com/misc/Waltons.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131130033904/http:/www.tinoanh.com/misc/Waltons.jpg)   
   
Thanks for any help. Or a similar font may do if the actual font is too hard to ID.   
   
Thanks again.   
   
K
author: khaavren

comments.content: Thanks for the quick response Yves. Very much appreciated. I'll have to look into this greek omega font for the W.

It's a stretched [Goudy Old Style Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131130033904/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/goudy-old-style/bold-italic/testdrive.html?s=The%20Waltons&p=72) with custom "W".

Actually that "W" might be an italic Greek omega...   
I'll need back-up from one of our experts for this
